snippet.title: The Mask: Mayhem | Teaser
snippet.description:
A Hotline Miami 2 level, inspired by the comics. You are a the Mask, a gang of bikers stood in your way. Blow them to shreds because you can and you like it.

Now available in Steam Workshop: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2564289340
